lang.name: Language
lang.description:
The language for me to use to talk to you.
If the server's language is forced, this setting will have no effect on users.

override_guild_lang.name: Force server language
override_guild_lang.description: Force using the language of this server instead of using every single user's language.

log_channel_id.name: Logs channel
log_channel_id.description: The channel where moderation logs will be sent.

muted_role_id.name: Muted role
muted_role_id.description: The role to give to users to mute.

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Whether to use Discord's timeout instead of the mute role.

ping_on_reply.name: Ping when replying
ping_on_reply.description: Pings you when I reply to your messages.

yt_news.name: YouTube Video notifications
yt_news.description: To receive notifications when a new video is uploaded on YouTube.

channel_id.name: Channel
channel_id.description: The channel where YouTube notifications will be sent.

message.name: Message
message.description: The message to send when a new video is uploaded.

markov.name: Text Generation
markov.description:
Settings for the text generator that uses the Markov process.*
**All messages generated by me are random and only use words previously sent by people.*

enabled.name: Enable
enabled.description:
Whether to enable message recording and generating.

When I record messages, I will only insert into my database the individual words and the number of times they have been used, so I won't save the full messages.

The data will be used only to generate new messages randomly, and will **NEVER** be sold or used for other purposes.
enabled.markov_enabled: Markov message generation has been enabled and the channel has been automatically set to this one.

channel_id.name: Channel
channel_id.description: The channel from which to record messages and generate new ones.
channel_id.channel_history_fetch: Do you want me to fetch the message history of the channel to generate better messages?
channel_id.cancelled: I won't fetch the message history, but I will start recording messages from the next one.
channel_id.learning: I'm processing the message history of the channel, this may take a very long time depending on the number of messages in this channel.
channel_id.done: Done. I will now start recording messages and replying with generated messages. Have fun!

messages.name: Messages
messages.description:
Settings for message generation.

You can set a random interval between a minimum and a maximum of messages (between 2 and 100) to be sent before I generate one.

I can send a message with up to 100 words, but you can also set a smaller number.

markov_add_my_messages.name: Use my messages
markov_add_my_messages.description: Whether to add your message to the database for generating new messages.
